Package org.actioncontroller.config

Class ConfigObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.actioncontroller.config.ConfigObserver
  • public class ConfigObserver
extends Object
    Used to monitor a set of configuration files and notify ConfigListeners on initialization and change. Given a directory and an application name, appropriate resources and files are monitored with a ConfigDirectoryLoader. If the system property `profile` or `profiles` is set, additionally scans for all files on the format <applicationName>-<profile>.properties

      • onConfigChange

        public ConfigObserver onConfigChange​(ConfigListener listener)
        The generic observer method. Call ConfigListener.onConfigChanged(java.util.Set<java.lang.String>, org.actioncontroller.config.ConfigMap) on the listener when this method is first called and again each time config changes.
